EmailTemplate.name: IPM template to Notify Auto-Deletion of Bosscard after 6 months of inactivity2
EmailTemplate.subject: Auto-Deletion of Bosscard after 6 months no activity
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your Bosscard: {!IPM_Bosscard__c.Name} will soon be deleted due to inactivity. Please provide an update to this record if you would like to prevent it from being deleted.
